articles.author: Sam Tabahriti
articles.title: SpaceX has so many Starlink satellites they're increasingly photobombing astronomers' images, a study says - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. SpaceX has so many Starlink satellites they're increasingly photobombing astronomers' images, a study says  Business Insider India
  2. SpaceX’s Starlink Satellites Are Photobombing Astronomy Images, Study Says  The Wall Street Journal
  3. …
articles.content:
There has been a huge increase in the number of astronomers' images corrupted by streaks of reflected sunlight caused by SpaceX's satellites, a new study has found.
According to the study, which was… [+1681 chars]
